job_title: Regional Sales Manager based in West of North America
job_description:
Excellent interpersonal skills, high standing, and abilities to manage relationship with our
customers and our colleagues.
• Min. 5 years of experience in establishing, developing and managing channel partner
network in a B-to-B sales environment.
• Proven track record of achieving sales targets via channel partner network.
• Proven track record in penetrating new markets and in growing sales and market share

exponentially.
• Preferably from the automation or robotic industries.
• Excellent communicator, good at collaboration across departments/ regions and understand

cross-cultural differences.
• Understand and can present value propositions convincingly to customers.
• Work well independently but also a team player.
• Highly motivated, self-directed, and results driven.
• Strong understanding of solution sales business and working with channel partners.
• Ability to operate between “hunting” for new possibilities and “farming” existing customers

and finding the required channel of partners to develop the business.
• Think and work at both strategic and hands on level.
• Flexible and professional. Industry; Automation; CNC Welding;

Responsibilities:
• Achieve sales targets and YoY growth via channel partner network in the assigned region.
• Hunt, develop and maintain a quality network of channel partners comprising of technical

distribution- or SI profiles who will scale with us.
• Onboard, activate, motivate and manage channel partners.
• Ability to develop partners to maximize their potential.
• Ability to influence and develop annual partner strategy and business plans.
• Manage and support channel partner’s pipeline.
• Regular review of business performances of channel partners and to influence and make

root cause analysis on poor performances and apply counter measures.
• Manage distribution contract negotiations and signing.
• Conduct sales training to develop, motivate and support our channel partners’ sales

team.
• Participate in outreach events i.e exhibitions, road shows, seminars, speaking
opportunities.
• Help establish processes necessary in supporting business growth and in achieving targets.
• Provide market intelligence and carry out sales forecast and reporting.

If you have interest in this opportunity, please feel free to contact Rebecca for further details
Email: View email address on hiredchina.com;
WeChat: hiredchina101
